meanings: (재산·목숨·나라 등을) guard; (방어하다) defend, protect; (보호하다) look after, take care of
(약속·법·질서 등을) keep, obey, follow, observe, stick[adhere] to, uphold

vlive.korean: 소중한 것을 지키려 할 때 히어로의 능력은 새로 깨어난다. When you have to protect something special, a hero's powers are reborn. 듣기 View video 홍익슈퍼 (HONG IK SUPER) : [홍익슈퍼]EP13_ 위기에 빠진 연희
vlive.english: When you have to protect something special, a hero's powers are reborn.

vlive.korean: 진짜 약속 지키실 수 있으세요? Can you keep that promise? 듣기 View video Dispatch : IZ*ONE DICON UNBOXING
나 지켜줘야 되는 게 있어? Do I have something to protect? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🍯💧즈 왔어용~☔️
vlive.english: Do I have something to protect?

vlive.korean: 그걸 제발 좀 지켜주세요 부탁드립니다 알겠죠? Please keep that promise. I ask you. Okay? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 용콩별콩 뒤집어지는 LIVE
vlive.english: Please keep that promise. I ask you. Okay?

vlive.korean: 음원도 지키고! We protected our album! 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE REALITY “TIME TO TWICE” – 대탈출 EP.03

examples.korean: Mating blackbirds will defend their territory against intruders. 발음듣기 짝짓기 기간인 지빠귀는 침입자에 대항해서 자기 영역을 지키려 든다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Mating blackbirds will defend their territory against intruders. 발음

examples.korean: I tried to be just to my promise. 발음듣기 나는 약속을 지키려 했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I tried to be just to my promise. 발음

examples.korean: The two leaders try to hold this thing together in ways that are, I think, quite remarkable. 발음듣기 두 지도자는 이를 지키려 노력하고 있고 그것은 꽤 주목할 만한 것이라고 생각합니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The two leaders try to hold this thing together in ways that are, I think, quite remarkable. 발음

examples.korean: According to the experts, it was just another way that Bush tried to stand his ground and guard his territory. 발음듣기 전문가들에 의하면, 이런 행동 역시 부시가 자신의 입장을 고수하고, 자신의 영역을 지키려 하는 또 다른 방법일 뿐이다. Neungyule
examples.english: According to the experts, it was just another way that Bush tried to stand his ground and guard his territory. 발음

examples.korean: I always try to maintain a neutral state between my Chinese heritage and my North American backgrounds. 발음듣기 나는 늘 중국인이라는 뿌리와 북미권에서 자란 성장배경 사이에서 중용을 지키려 노력하고 있다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: I always try to maintain a neutral state between my Chinese heritage and my North American backgrounds. 발음
